author: Video Advice
description:
#science #jacobogrinberg #pachita 
In Mexico, during the early 1990s, a respected researcher named Jacobo Grinberg claimed he had witnessed something that defied everything science believes about reality.
Days before he was expected to reveal his findings… he disappeared without a trace.

Grinberg was a psychologist and investigator at the National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM), known for his groundbreaking studies on perception, human potential, and the unexplained. His work often placed him at the intersection between science and the mystical traditions of indigenous Mexico — including strange phenomena he personally documented.

According to those close to him, Jacobo was preparing to share something far more extraordinary than anything he had published before. Something he witnessed firsthand… something that “should not be possible.”

Then, in December 1994, he simply vanished.
title: He Proved We Live In a Simulation... Then Disappeared Completely
